document_data.mainbody:
he High House of the Wonderful Wheel was a temple dedicated to Gond located in the city of Ordulin in 1358 DR. It was destroyed alongside Ordulin in 1374 DR, until the city was rebuilt in 1499 DR.
The temple was run by High Priest Gondsman Chansibral Thjestnal. Chansibral was assisted by 22 other priests and 38 followers. With Nightal 1 , the temple and its clergy were destroyed with the city in the planar rift to the Plane of Shadow opened by Sharran priestess Elyril Hraven.
